FuncDef: This command configures traffic profiles for non-IP traffic such as PPPoE. It is used in conjunction with the profiled-traffic-only on single subscriber SAPs and creates a subscriber host which is used to forward non-IP traffic through the single subscriber SAP without the need for SAP queues.

ParaDef.Info: Identifies the subscriber profile name up to 32 characters.
Identifies the SLA profile name up to 32 characters.
